short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for repair and overhaul services to support its Uncrewed Aerial Systems
description: Trade Agreement: Canada Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada Panama agreement , TFCWCEB CFTA Agreement, CAN-669-0021-AGTE), Supplier Requirements: Suppliers must have a demonstrated history of repairing and overhauling Uncrewed Aerial systems ford the Canadian Forces, Tendering Procedures: Suppliers on permanent list or able to meet qualification requirements.
duration_in_months: title-titre-eng-Uncrewed Aerial System Repair and Overhaul
full_summary:
### Uncrewed Aerial System Repair and Overhaul

#### Notice Information
| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Contracting Entity | Public Works and Government Services Canada |
| End User Entity | Department of National Defence |
| Contact Person | Sean Webster, Contracting Authority |

#### Notice Details
* **Reference Number**: PW-KIN-555-8716
* **Solicitation Number**: W6399-23DB09/A
* **Amendment**: 1
* **Publication Date**: December 1, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 15, 2022, 14:00 EST
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

#### Description of the Notice
Trade Agreement: CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea
Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
The Canadian Department of National Defence requires repair and overhaul services for Uncrewed Aerial Systems. Interested suppliers must be listed on the standard process or meet the supplier qualification requirements.

#### Supplier Requirements
The Government of Canada requires bidders to use the epost Connect service to transmit their offers electronically. Suppliers must refer to Part 2 of the RFP for further information.

#### Important Dates
* Reference Date: Indefinite (Deliverables have been mentioned above)
* Procurement Timelines have been achieved
* **Notice Retention Rights**: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on procurement terms.

#### Additional Requirements
* The Government of Canada has reserved the right not to award a contract.
* Titles mentioned above may be used during communication.
